summary: AIR BAG LIGHT FLASHING SINCE CAR WAS NEW. DEALER FOUND NO CODES IN SYSTEM AND TURNED LIGHT OFF, SAID NOTHING WAS WRONG. LIGHT CONTINUED TO COME ON FOR A MONTH OR SO AND THEN GO OFF, THEN REPEAT THE PROCESS OF COMING ON AND OFF, FOR THE NEXT FEW YEARS. NOW DEALER SAYS IT NEEDS A NEW AIR BAG FOR $4,000.  *TR
